Articles.Content:
Hi, for some reason the dark part of Kerbin has started appearing like this:

Any ideas why?

Huh, are you using that WIP mod that hides unexplored parts of planets? It shouldn't do it to kerbin, but who knows.

If not, then I suspect this might be a problem with the visual enhancement you use. Likely that the dark side texture, which shows cities lights and stuff, didn't work for some reason.

Hmmm no I don't use WIP and I haven't changed anything either. Ill maybe reinstall all mods and take it from there!

Thanks

It's EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements causing the problem. In order to fix it I would change all the .tga flies to .png files. All the texture files are found in the BoulderCo folder in your GameData folder.

If you need more information, I found this post that deals with your current problem.

I had the same issue and getting rid of Planet Shine seemed to fix it. Unload Planet shine and see if that does the trick. Space Explorer may have a better solution. A more permanent and acceptable solution.
